alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 1:25PM EDT until July 07 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Caledonia County in northeastern Vermont... Southwestern Essex County in northeastern Vermont... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 125 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greenbank Hollow, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... St. Johnsbury, Lyndon, Waterford, Gilman, Granby, Kirby, Victory, Barnet, Concord, Lunenburg, Danville, Lower Waterford, Lyndonville Village, Guildhall, Walden, Peacham, St. Johnsbury Center, Concord Corner, West Waterford, and West Barnet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
